meanings.sent1: The cubeb in the garden is growing well.
meanings.sent2: I bought some cubeb plants to add to my spice collection.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cubeb plant refuse to spice up the party? It was feeling a bit shy.
meanings.sent4: The cubeb plant stood tall among the other spices, like a king in a garden.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the cubeb plant danced in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The dried unripe berries of this plant, used as a spice.
meanings.sent1: I added a pinch of cubeb to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of cubeb filled the kitchen as I ground the berries.
meanings.sent3: The cubeb berries rolled off the table and into the pot, adding a surprise twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of cubeb, adding a hint of joy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The cubeb berries crackled and popped in the pan, releasing their spicy essence.
